content:
Diagnosis
	1. Clear cell renal cell carcinoma, right kidney
	Date of diagnosis
	January 2024

	Treatment aim
	Curative intent

	Summary of completed treatment and relevant dates

	Surgery
	15 Jan 2024 Right radical nephrectomy and lymph node dissection
	Complications: Post-operative ileus requiring 5-day admission

	Systemic therapy
	1 Mar 2024 commenced adjuvant pembrolizumab

	Current disease status
	No evidence of disease recurrence

	Current issues
	Grade 2 immune-mediated thyroiditis

	Summary of consultation
	Reviewed today prior to cycle 4 pembrolizumab. Treatment has been generally well-tolerated apart from thyroid dysfunction. TSH now suppressed at <0.01 with elevated free T4 at 28, consistent with thyroiditis. Started on propranolol 40mg bd for associated tachycardia. Otherwise maintaining excellent performance status with no other immune-related adverse events. Latest chest x-ray and biochemistry show no evidence of disease recurrence.

	Further investigations
	Repeat TFTs in 1 week
	Routine surveillance CT chest/abdomen/pelvis in 6 weeks

	Medication prescribed
	Propranolol 40mg bd

	Follow up
	Next oncology follow up in 3 weeks pre-cycle 5
	Endocrinology review arranged for thyroid management

	Required GP actions
	Weekly TFT monitoring
	Alert if grade 3-4 immune-related adverse events develop

cancer_timeline.value: Right radical nephrectomy and lymph node dissection with post-operative ileus requiring 5-day admission
TSH suppressed <0.01 with elevated free T4 at 28, consistent with thyroiditis
Chest x-ray and biochemistry show no evidence of disease recurrence

status_updates.value: Right renal cell carcinoma post nephrectomy, currently receiving adjuvant pembrolizumab with no evidence of recurrence. Developed immune-mediated thyroiditis requiring treatment.
Continuing with cycle 4 pembrolizumab, started on propranolol 40mg bd for thyroiditis symptoms
Repeat TFTs in 1 week, surveillance CT chest/abdomen/pelvis in 6 weeks
Oncology review in 3 weeks pre-cycle 5, endocrinology review arranged for thyroid management
